channel.title: 2017-03-23 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2017-03-23 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 23 Mar 2017 00:00
item.description: 2mi to the optometrist, contact ‘fittings’ and then 4mi back home via the ‘short-cut’. Listened to the Outside podcast on Joe Stone’s crash while speed flying. Spring is in and so is the warm weather. So gonna miss the freezing runs.
item.content:encoded: 2mi to the optometrist, contact ‘fittings’ and then 4mi back home via the ‘short-cut’. Listened to the Outside podcast on Joe Stone’s crash while speed flying. Spring is in and so is the warm weather. So gonna miss the freezing runs.
